overview:
Empowering Global Content Creators to Easily Build and Publish Immersive Mobile Apps for Any Device.

Kleverbeast is the premium mobile app design and publishing platform for the Apple iOS and Android platforms empowering users globally to create custom native mobile app experiences for their customers, readers and stakeholders. The platform for the first time creates a self service solution that users with no technical or design background can use to create premium mobile applications in a matter of a couple of hours. The Kleverbeast patent pending technology allows users to create apps that rival apps produced by the best custom app development and design studios around the globe at a fraction of the cost and at a far more expedient time frame.

Kleverbeast is backed by a board and management team with decades of technology, corporate governance and creative industry experience across the globe and currently has offices in New York City and Sofia, Bulgaria.
